participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, she is passionate about her dreams of becoming a lawyer.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for a generations. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, he enjoys spending time outdoors and appreciates simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i live in a house. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.
